title: Ekko and his 'Unknown' opponent
body:
As we know, Ekko is the new (probably broken) champion. However in the video teaser released, it is confirmed, riot says it is not a known champion. IS This possibly two champion teasers in one? Anyone think they could be making that monster sized guy a new champion? Thoughts? 

ALSO, URGOT REWORK SOON! Confirmed by riot.. wish I had the link, someone care to help out on the link? ;) edit: 

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T100RXKY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-11T02:02:30.073+0000)
>
> Do you mean... this link: 
> 
> https://twitter.com/RiotVesh/status/597569668530868224

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Gypsyleeboy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T100RXKY,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-11T01:58:07.822+0000)

> ALSO, URGOT REWORK SOON! Confirmed by riot.. wish I had the link, someone care to help out on the link? ;)

Do you mean... this link: 

https://twitter.com/RiotVesh/status/597569668530868224


> Miles Miller
> â€@RiotVesh
> No that's not the Urgot rework. Yes I am actually working on an Urgot rework. The guy in ekko's trailer wasn't him though!

Pretty certain he's just some generic Zaun baddy. People saying it's Augmented Singed make no sense whatsoever; Singed would, y'know, use poison as a weapon, in addition to looking something like Singed.

> [{quoted}](name=Teenbus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T100RXKY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-11T03:56:28.695+0000)
>
> Pretty certain he's just some generic Zaun baddy. People saying it's Augmented Singed make no sense whatsoever; Singed would, y'know, use poison as a weapon, in addition to looking something like Singed.

LOL this Teenbus kid just gets on the boards to deny everyone and say they are wrong he forgets the boards are for ideas not just facts.

> [{quoted}](name=Valaran Nara,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T100RXKY,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-11T19:06:20.273+0000)
>
> See, if Ekko lives in Zaun, and he's dressed like that, I'm going to have to assume he lives in the gutter cause I don't think that's Zaun street fashion.{{champion:222}} 
> 
> On the plus side, if he lives in Zaun, that just means we get to see a possible Jinx cameo in his story. Lol. Righteous.
> 
> While we're speaking of Jinx, has anybody noticed that blue haired girl on the memorial with that 1 braid?

If the artwork really does depict Jinx, then it could lead to interesting conclusions about the character know as Jinx. I bet most of those kids on the wall lived in the slums of Zaun like Janna did, except Janna got away before Zaun consumed her, Jinx got crazy cause of it, and Ekko is fighting against it.
hes fighting augmented singed i think

Yeah,that big guy is most likely just some random enemy.Although I originally thought ekko is from piltover,but if he has guys like that one running around then he might actually live in zaun(his hair would also fit more into zaun)
Soon is really overstating it. I'd say Urgot is a year away, at least.
It is a generic thug. Has about as much character as Helmet Bro.

Can we please get that huge guy as a new champ instead of this little nigga?

Or rework Urgot and give us that beast please, thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=Pucking Purrfect,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=T100RXKY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T02:02:21.721+0000)
>
> Can we please get that huge guy as a new champ instead of this little nigga?
> 
> Or rework Urgot and give us that beast please, thanks.

the new Urgot ultimate they were talking about, similar to Nasus/Renekton ULT - when Urgot presses R he becomes that new buffed version, instead of swapping positions.
